thread.title: Seven First Choice Loan Originators Featured on Prestigious List
thread.title_full: Seven First Choice Loan Originators Featured on Prestigious List

author: PRWEB
title: Seven First Choice Loan Originators Featured on Prestigious List
text:
It’s clear from this recognition that they are providing service beyond belief to their business partners, homeowners and homebuyers. That is what First Choice is known for, and we couldn’t be more proud. DALLAS, TX
New Jersey-based residential mortgage lender First Choice Loan Services Inc., a wholly owned subsidiary of First Choice Bank, proudly announces that seven of its loan originators are featured as “Five Star Mortgage Professionals” in a list published in the June, 2015, issue of Texas Monthly.
Included in this year’s Five Star Mortgage Professionals list are first year winner Herb Ziev, second year winner Kim Clow, third year winners Laura Lembke and Josh Moody, and fourth year winners Michael Inkman, Cory Neal and Louis Sedita.
Founded in 2003, Five Star Professional conducts market-specific research throughout the U.S. and Canada to identify reputable and trustworthy service professionals. Research results undergo a thorough regulatory review, and qualifying individuals receive the Five Star award. Then, Five Star Professional joins forces with city and regional magazines to make the research results available to consumers in more than 45 markets across the United States and Canada.
“It is a high compliment to once again be named as a Five Star Mortgage Professional. Knowing the amount of effort that goes into the review process that leads to the ultimate selection really makes it that much more of an honor,” said Moody who has been with First Choice Loan Services since 2011. “I know I speak on behalf of my colleagues when I say special distinctions like this would not be possible if it weren’t for the valued relationships with have with our realtor and builder partners and the clients we serve. Their satisfaction and happiness is our loan originators’ ultimate goal.”
Executive Vice President of National Production James Iley is excited to have such a strong representation of loan originators from First Choice Loan Services appear as Five Star Mortgage Professionals.
“We are so delighted to have these seven First Choice loan originators earn a spot on the list of Five Star Mortgage Professionals. First Choice prides itself in being the professional home for the best loan originators in the industry. Having so many of our team members honored in this fashion demonstrates that we have the right people with us,” said Iley. “It’s clear from this recognition that they are providing service beyond belief to their business partners, homeowners and homebuyers. That is what First Choice is known for, and we couldn’t be more proud.”
All loan originators from First Choice Loan Services appearing as “Five Star Mortgage Professionals” in Texas Monthly’s June, 2015, issue are based in Dallas, Texas. For more information on Five Star Professionals, visit http://www.fivestarprofessional.com/ .
About First Choice Loan Services Inc.
Headquartered in East Brunswick, New Jersey, First Choice Loan Services Inc. is a wholly owned subsidiary of First Choice Bank. Founded in 2009, the company is licensed to originate and close residential mortgage loans nationwide, excluding New Hampshire and Arkansas. With 15 locations across 9 states and over 600 employees, First Choice Loan Services Inc. offers FHA and VA programs, Jumbo loans, fixed and adjustable rate loans, and refinancing and renovation programs. First Choice Loan Services Inc. is an Equal Housing Lender, NMLS #210764. To learn more about First Choice, visit http://fcloans.com/ .
